name: ListReviewCommentsForRepo
description:
Retrieve review comments for all pull requests in a repository.

Use this tool to obtain a list of review comments for all pull requests within a specified repository. This is useful for tracking feedback and discussions associated with pull requests.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive. Specify the username or organization name.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to fetch review comments from. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: sort_reviews
parameters.description: Determines the order of review comments based on 'created', 'updated', or 'created_at'.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specifies the order to sort the review comments. Options are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending. Note: This is ignored if no 'sort' parameter is set.

value_schema.description: The direction to sort results. Ignored without `sort` parameter.

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Timestamp to filter notifications updated after this time in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of review comments to retrieve per page, with a maximum limit of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of the results to retrieve from the API. Used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
